summary: Completed comprehensive testing of TikTok Automation App - Backend APIs (100% pass) and Frontend UI (100% pass). All requested features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code is well-structured with proper separation of concerns
MongoDB serialization handled correctly via utils.py
All interactive elements have data-testid attributes for testing
API error handling is implemented properly
seed_data_creation: Test trends created and cleaned up during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Trends CRUD (POST/GET/DELETE), Niches recommended, Dashboard stats, Navigation between all pages. Video generation is a skeleton (not tested per instructions).

backend_api_tests.trends_post: PASS - POST /api/trends creates trend with correct response
backend_api_tests.trends_get: PASS - GET /api/trends returns list with count
backend_api_tests.dashboard_stats: PASS - GET /api/dashboard/stats returns all required fields

frontend_ui_tests.dashboard_load: PASS - Dashboard shows stats and recommended niches
frontend_ui_tests.navigation: PASS - All 5 nav items work (Dashboard, Tendances, Générer Vidéo, Bibliothèque, Analytics)
frontend_ui_tests.trend_form: PASS - Add trend form opens with all fields (title, niche, views, engagement, url)
frontend_ui_tests.trend_submit: PASS - Form submission works, shows success message
frontend_ui_tests.trend_list: PASS - Trends display with niche badge, views, engagements
frontend_ui_tests.trend_delete: PASS - Delete button works with confirmation dialog
